name: truffled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
cooked, prepared, or served with truffles (= a type of rare fungus that grows underground and can be eaten): I had a delicious truffled macaroni cheese to start. My fish was served on some excellent truffled mashed potato.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had a big plate of truffled scrambled eggs and toast for breakfast.The creamy truffled sauce was perfect with the steak. We ordered the truffled fries, which were just so good.Try the curried lamb with truffled potatoes.The eggs can be made into a delicious truffled omelette.
